caption.p: Phylogenetic tree based on the complete chloroplast genome sequences of S. rostratum and 45 other species belonging to the Solanum. The tree was generated using a neighbour-joining method using MEGA 7.0 with 1000 bootstrap replicates. Numbers on the nodes indicate bootstrap values. The NCBI accession numbers of chloroplast DNA sequences used in this study are presented in parentheses. The scale bar represents the number of substitutions per site.
